definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]

sentences.english: You have earned enough merit to pass the imperial examinations.
sentences.chinese: 你们的福报足以使你们通过科举考试。

sentences.english: Can somebody else be rich, this also isf quote?
sentences.chinese: 可人家就是有钱，这也是福报？

sentences.english: A truly charitable person will perform charitable deeds without the thought of getting name or rewards.
sentences.chinese: 真正布施行善的人不要名利，也不求福报。

sentences.english: He had given away all his wealth but gained nothing.
sentences.chinese: 全部的财产都布施光了，然而却没获得什么福报。

sentences.english: The above seven execute, all does by the heart, does not damage the wealth, all big lucky newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 以上七施，全由心作，均不损财，皆得大福报。

sentences.english: Many of our after 80 this way of life, these so-called f quote?
sentences.chinese: 我们很多80后这样的生活，这些就是所谓的福报吗？

sentences.english: In the future will achieve Buddhahood, all kind of wisdom heart, will be the famous heart executes the fifth big lucky newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 未来成佛，得一切种智心，是名心施第五大福报。

sentences.english: One who knows about life is also a meritorious being.
sentences.chinese: 懂得生命的人，也是有福报的人。

sentences.english: Those who get by unfair means money also isf quote?
sentences.chinese: 那些通过不正当手段得到的钱也是福报？

sentences.english: In the future will achieve Buddhahood, in all time valuable lotus flower place, will be the seventh big lucky newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 未来成佛，于一切时得宝莲花座，是名第七大福报。

definition: karmic hindrance (buddhism)/karmic consequences that stand in the way of enlightenment/(term of abuse, especially toward the younger generation) devil spawn/(fig.) money
to accumulate merit/to do good/to give to charity/virtuous actions
to do good works/to be merciful
to abandon suffering and obtain happiness (Buddhism)
